Bibliographic References: Ex Basel Market, M u M , Auktion 60, 21 Sept. 1982, no. 45, pi. 22; LIMC 1, Ananke 1, pi. 611, 3.; A. Griffiths, JHS 106, 1986, p. 64, pi. 2d.
Imagery Description: Cadmus and the dragon—Cadmus (ΚΑΔΜΟΣ) attacking the dragon, Thebe (ΘΕΒΗ), Ismene (ΙΣΜΗΝΗ), Dirke (ΔΙΡΚΗ) seated by tree, Athena, woman rising from the ground (ΑΝΑΚ..)
